summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York notifying a contractor about a new production of Deutsche Bank materials related to the Epstein case, placed in a 'SECOND PRODUCTION pending folder' for review.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, informing a contractor about new Deutsche Bank discovery materials added for the Epstein case.

events.title: New Deutsche Bank Discovery Production
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney places a new production of Deutsche Bank materials in the SECOND PRODUCTION pending folder for the Epstein case, continuing from prior materials.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank materials were being produced as discovery in the Epstein case as of August 2019.
The materials were part of a 'SECOND PRODUCTION' and were placed in a pending folder for review.
The document numbering for the Deutsche Bank materials continued from a prior sequence, starting with DB-SDNY-0001711.
The communication highlights ongoing legal discovery efforts by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in the Epstein investigation.
